item.title: CVE-2022-2034|2024-08-03T00:24:43.797Z -- unknown -- sensei%20lms
item.description: The Sensei LMS WordPress plugin before 4.5.0 does not have proper permissions set in one of its REST endpoint, allowing unauthenticated users to access private messages sent to teachers
